values:
im scared.  i shouldnt be, i mean if u dont..then why should it matter right? but i said and u said but what we said doenst mean a thing cuz its not real. not the truth right? i mean, after all when it comes down to it u dont. why does it bother me so much? cuz i trust u and i love u and we live. together, seperate, it doesnt matter.. we did.  if only i could...but if i do u wont...and ur tired of it.

i feel alone and unloved.  5 hours away. from nothing.  to better. is it worth it, yes. 

im sorry

i feel better about some things 

yet worse bout others.

i cant live like this. 

it hurts.


















DISCLAIMER
*no one take this personally unless u talk to me first.  u wont know who u are, or if u are, unless u ask.*

i moved half of my stuff into my apartment yestarday... and i met my roommate for the first time... and i signed my first lease. all very exciting and stressful and sad. im gonna miss my girls...we were all crying on thursday.  i came back today to get more stuff and saw them again (i wasnt anticipating on coming back at all).  it feels like this day came to quickly..i didnt get to say my "cya laters" to everyone.  i do really like the idea of being on my own and not having to deal with the shit thats goin on.  the day i turned 20 is the day my life/world flipped upside down and i finally see a little glimmer of light...a little happiness perhaps?  i hope so.

It's been a long time since my last entry, nothing significantly good has happened. a lot of bad things but not good..until today....

I just got my acceptance letter to UMASS BOSTON!!!!!!!!!!

BOSTON HERE I COME!!!! WOOHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO

The Keys to Your Heart

You are attracted to those who are unbridled, untrammeled, and free.
In love, you feel the most alive when your lover is creative and never lets you feel bored.
You'd like to your lover to think you are loyal and faithful... that you'll never change.
You would be forced to break up with someone who was emotional, moody, and difficult to please.
Your ideal relationship is open. Both of you can talk about everything... no secrets.
Your risk of cheating is zero. You care about society and morality. You would never break a commitment.
You think of marriage as something that will confine you. You are afraid of marriage.
In this moment, you think of love as something you don't need. You just feel like flirting around and playing right now.
What Are The Keys To Your Heart?
shockingly very true

i cant remember the last time i was this happy... it kinda scares me though.  shans mom said its ok to be happy, but i was all set in not letting anything new in my life cuz of everythign thats going on, i really need to pay attention to my family and focus on my school work. but i guess its true when they say when u least expect it.  im thinking too much and im no supposed to do that. im so happy though.

lots of stuff goin down at the home front...ok now i got the brooklyn out of me.  the same stuff but more is still going on from my last post.  i feel bad that im happy though.  im not happy about whats going on, but its nice to be happy.  im glad that the happy feeling is overriding the sad/stressed/mad/depressed feeling. i hope everything starts to work out today. spring break starts friday which is totally awesome cuz the docs are going away for the beginning.  we'll see how everything goes... to be continued..

On a happy note:

The Lilith Magazine is finally out.  It's nice to have something that shows how much hard work I put into it.  It was also nice to have both of my parents supporting me in this, and not just my dad.  We had a party today and both of my parents showed up, i brought michael, and my mom brought paige emma and aimee.  I cant remember the last time i felt supported by my mom. 

on a not so happy note:

It feels like all of the walls around me are crumbling and if i dont stay stong, everythign will crumble.  im so sorry to all of my friends and family. im sorry for being angry all the time and snapping at everyone. anything anyone says makes me cry.  u guys know that i dont cry in front of anyone...until recently.  i just really hope everything will be ok...it will. it has to be.

i need to find some way to make money but not work 7 days a week.  it sux oober much.  i go to school come home to change...go to work but only to come home too exhausted to do homework or study.  so i push myself to do the bear minimum..and thats just not good enough.  im so behind in everything important.  time to shape up. 

todays schedule:

stat 930-1045 (good goin kristy, didnt even go to that class)

Lilith 11-1215 (good goin kris, didnt do the invitations like you were supposed to last week)

Anatomy and Physiology 1230-145 (i'll go there just to see Dustin and John/Landon)

work at office 3-7

mall 7-8 (good goin kritty, you didnt get ur best friend a birthday present yet)

dinner at eldorado 8-10 (best friends birthday..dont fuck it up and be late or something)

watch previously taped elimination of American Idol 10-1130 (cmon Joey, don't get voted off...however if you are, i'll be able to see you sing for once) 

anatomy homework 1130-130 (cmon, you can do it...)

there was a delayed start today.  opening at 930, too bad i dont have class until 11.  im not going anyway.  im not gonna drive in this shit just to see that theres no parking becuase the school doesnt believe in plowing and then gives tickets to the people who they think arent in a parking spot.  and if by some chance u do find a spot, u can forget about walking safely to class because the walkways are not cleared off either.  good old scruffolk for ya.

so many decisions...

i feel like sometimes i sort of get scared of moving on... i really like dustin but my insecurities and fears get in the way of persuing anything.  i got a job offer that i think pays more than what i get now but im afraid of change.  im the one getting cold feet about transfering schools..especially to one off of long island.  my mind is racing and i dont know what to do.

EXPLODE!!

 

its been so long since ive felt like this but hes just so adorable and he makes me feel good..he tells me that this motherly characteristic of mine is a good thing and he smells soooooo good and hes just so lovey and ahhhhhhhhhhhhh now i have to go to the bug and act all cool and casual but really i want to explodeeeee im going to and second nooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooowwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww.

 

BOOM!!!!!

today is february 14, 2005...

today is valentines day...

today just is.



the greatest highlights of my day...get rose corsage from my dad (cuz im lame; or just date lame guys who dont buy me flowers and stuff) go to class, see mil, go home, watch "real women have curves" (surprisingly good movie), deal with my hard to manage new hair. 

later im going to watch the notebook with shan and john to avoid couples night.

official debut of fall '04- spring '05 suffolk county community college Lilith magazine is March 19th (which i edited, layed out, and everything else). come one and all at 5pm in the babylon student center Mildred Green room.



Did i forget to mention there will be free food and festivities????

so...

i dont know if this is good or bad.  i might just be reaching for the past, but on march 6th i think im gonna go to a twirling competition...as supporter not a competitor, which i have never done before.  it will be the first time seeing everything and everyone since i had to quit 2 years ago...

i regret quiting sometimes.  i miss it.  its too late to go back as a competitor...maybe as a coach. i can't believe i'm saying this but i'm too old to compete. but i'll see how everything is when i get there on march. ill talk to people and see whats up. 

i want amanda to come with me. i think she will want to.  im gonna ask her tomorrow. or maybe ill leave her a message in her "myspace".

nationals is in kansas..how sucky is that.

whats going on? i get so angry when im confused like this.  it seems like only yestarday "we were never friends". and today we are? i cant let myself do that again...and thats what im doing.  time doesnt heal a gushing wound when there is no bandaid...dont expect me to just start where we left off.  you have to make an effort...and just talking like we used to isnt the effort i mean.  there has to be some sort of closure to what happened..and there was a reason for what happened so that needs to be worked out too.  the ball is in your court.  do you value my friendship enough to talk it out or do you just wanna stay the way we were b4 we started working together.  i cant just pretend.

AHHHHHHHH!!! Every time i try to do the survey that shannon did, I have to go to a class. 

to sum up whats going on.  the deadline for the magazine is tomorrow night and its no where near finished.  my tuesday thursday classes are the bomb.  theres two guys..one more than the other though...in my human sexuality class thats totally flirting with me. its cute. my other classes suck though. but i knew that was gonna happen.  

i am very nervous about how tonight is gonna turn out.  its so stupid though.  Im kind of angry too, but i think its just a cover for the nerves/anxiousness.  

life is all kinds of sucky right now but i dont talk about it to anyone...not even shan and john really. and i feel bad cuz i love them and they know everything about me and theyre trying to help but im just being a bitch. im sorry guys.
what should i say. what can i say. be careful your head doesnt explode. egotistical asshole.

I gave in.  I asked the doc see me today.  The verdict is a sinus infection and if left alone, will be pneumonia.  so im like ok ill get the prescription filled tonight (cuz leave it up to me to get sick when we dont have any samples in the office).  i go to eckerd only to find out that the prescription costs almost $100. I will not pay that.  So i have to see if i can get something else tomorrow.  Mean while, I;m miserable...my head is killing me, i cant breathe or taste or smell.  and im sneezing and blowing my nose constantly....I think i used a whole box of tissues today in the 6 hours that i worked.  im gonna try and get some sleep now. gnight

even though 2004 was hard...it was one of the greatest years and im sad to say good bye to it.  this year is going to be full of change and its going to pull on our friendship... i am not looking foward to it. but i will take it one day at a time, and with the 3 of us together, we can overcome the bad, like we did last year.

Good Bye 2004.
 
Welcome 2005.

Happy New Year Everyone!!

1) not be so motherly
2) find me a boytoy (now that the testosterone fast is over...well technically i have 3 hours and 45 min)

i cant wait till after my finals today. i got the paper done in like 3 hours which was awesome. and now class is gonna start in 20 min and im gonna be late.

so the korpi holida party went as planned..pretty much anyway. i had a good time. its nice to see everyone i havent seen since the last holiday party.  im kind of surprised that some people werent as civil as i though..but then again, why am i surprised?  im exhausted and full of finals this week.  i cant wait until friday...  good night all.

1. Grab the nearest book.
2. Open the book to page 123.
3. Find the fifth sentence.
4. Post the text of the sentence in your journal along with these instructions.
5. Don't search around and look for the "coolest" book you can find. Do what's actually next to you.


"George Granville, Lord Lansdowne (an amateur dramatist who was a great admirer of Aphra), described the standard method of undermining a play: "They spread themselves in parties all over the house; some in teh pit, some in boxes, others in teh galleries, but principally on the stage; they cough, sneeze,talk loud, and break silly jests; the house is an uproar; some laugh and clap, some hiss and are angry; swords are drawn, the actors interrupted, teh scene broken off, and so the play's sent to the devil."

from Reconstructing Aphra; A social biography of Aphra Behn bye Angeling Goreau

Im in the lilith office..we only have stupid books in here lol.

And, by the way, if you didn't care about me, then why do you care about what I write?  It shouldnt matter if I write something directed at you or about you or has nothing to do with you.  If I am such a horrible person, what I think wouldnt matter.
I respond because you are responding to mine.  How could I understand it.  You never really gave me an explanation.

I was going through my friends lists a few days ago and came across a name i've never seen before. so i go and check it out every once and a while.  I saved a response that was made to a previous post of mine.  i have some questions though: if i mean nothing to you, then why am i on ur friends list...ur not on mine.  and...should i post this for 5 minutes the way u did or should i keep it up the whole time or should i even post it at all?  To answer your question..the reason i saved it is to remember how u really do think of me.  I'm going to have to sleep on this thought. 

John and Shannon...I Love You.  Thank you so much.
i really have to learn to not work so much.  gotta love the benefits though. i just have toooooo much to do. after work, its off to starbucks with john and shannon.

I'm not much of a writer.  These are just some rough thoughts.  Any constructive criticism is welcome.  I'm just tired of being predictable and putting some pop song on here to describe how I feel.  They never seem to be exact anyway.

So...

i adopted a lizard...a something something gecko.  Hes soooo cute. Hes paralyzed though...from the waste down.  Apparantly he was in an accident on his way to petland discounts.  I named him Leo..meaning lion or strength and courage.  Hes starting to move his legs a little but i think its just nerve reflexes...we'll see.  He's my baby.

other than that, ive been working my ass off.  working pretty much 7 days a week is killin me. oh well. only 3 weeks until school is over. and partay on the 17th! i think a few of us are getting a hotel and drinking till we cant drink anymore.  itll be fun.  

im tired and have class at 8am.  gnight

Happy Turkey Day everyone!  

Wexler says Hello!!!! HAHAHAHA
